Grid¶

JavaScript¶

Plugins.fn.grid_offset(width, height)¶

Adds an offset element to the top to the current context.

Arguments:
  • width (float) – The offset element’s width.
  • height (float) – The offset element’s height.
Returns:

An object providing enable and disable functions.
